meanings.definition: A person who maintains or preserves something.
meanings.sent1: The maintainers of the park ensure it stays clean and beautiful.
meanings.sent2: The maintainers of the old building work hard to keep it in good shape.
meanings.sent3: The maintainers of the peace were always ready to resolve conflicts peacefully.
meanings.sent4: She was the maintainer of traditions in the family, holding onto them dearly.
meanings.sent5: The maintainers of the forest were like silent guardians, protecting its beauty.

meanings.definition: A device or substance used to keep something in good condition.
meanings.sent1: The oil is an important maintainer for the engine, keeping it running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The sunscreen lotion acts as a maintainer for healthy skin under the sun.
meanings.sent3: The magical potion was a strange maintainer for the cursed artifact.
meanings.sent4: Laughter was the best maintainer of happiness in their household.
meanings.sent5: The music player was a trusty maintainer of joy during their road trips.

meanings.definition: A group of people who support or uphold something.
meanings.sent1: The maintainers of the charity organization work tirelessly to help those in need.
meanings.sent2: The maintainers of the team spirit always boost morale during tough times.
meanings.sent3: The maintainers of the secret club had a special handshake to identify each other.
meanings.sent4: Family was the strongest maintainer of her values and beliefs.
meanings.sent5: The maintainers of justice in the town were respected for their fairness.
